column5: I am looking to stock up with bottom bouncers, really like the Lite Bites. Just don't seem to be able to find them at local tackle stores. Would like to buy them in bulk. Thanks in advance.

I got mine at http://www.justfishontario.com/our_store.htmand they are $22.95 for a bulk order of twenty five including the weight snaps. Plus you can mix and match which sizes you would like and they are authentic Quick Change products. I see they got bulk snells with Quick Change blade clevis available too as well as complete kits. I thought in comparing the two sites that this was easiest and less expensive when you total up everything such as taxes and shipping.
